content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":52671,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みんなを……信じています。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I believe in everyone...\""},{"lineNumber":52672,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして、落胆されたくないんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"And I don't want to see anyone disappointed."},{"lineNumber":52673,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大事な人たちに」","translatedEnglishLine":"To the important people.\""},{"lineNumber":52674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………ほっほ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hoho.\""},{"lineNumber":52675,"originalJapaneseLine":"その姿に、チョチョマンは満足げに眼を細める。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that figure, Chochoman narrowed his eyes with satisfaction."},{"lineNumber":52676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「良いものです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a good thing."},{"lineNumber":52677,"originalJapaneseLine":"　若者の成長を間近で見られるというのは」","translatedEnglishLine":"To be able to see the growth of youth up close.\""},{"lineNumber":52678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……恐縮です、チョチョマン先生」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I'm honored, Master Chochoman.\""},{"lineNumber":52679,"originalJapaneseLine":"面映ゆげに、アレックスが苦笑をこぼした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Blushing slightly, Alex let out an awkward smile."},{"lineNumber":52680,"originalJapaneseLine":"肩の力がほんの少し抜けた後には、","translatedEnglishLine":"After he slightly relaxed his shoulders,"},{"lineNumber":52681,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう最後のシークエンスに入っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"they had already entered the final sequence."},{"lineNumber":52682,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、先生……いえ四天王閣下。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, Master... no, Your Excellency of the Four Heavenly Kings."},{"lineNumber":52683,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最後のキーの入力を」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please input the final key.\""},{"lineNumber":52684,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいはい、っと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, yes, alright.\""},{"lineNumber":52685,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっほ。では掛かりますか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hoho. Shall we get started?\""},{"lineNumber":52686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、ははっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha, haha!\""},{"lineNumber":52687,"originalJapaneseLine":"四天王、チョチョマン・パブリが","translatedEnglishLine":"The Four Heavenly Kings member, Chochoman Pabli,"},{"lineNumber":52688,"originalJapaneseLine":"配下と共に制御システムまでやって来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"had come all the way to the control system with his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":52689,"originalJapaneseLine":"「手筈はお伝えしてありますな？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The arrangements have been communicated, right?"},{"lineNumber":52690,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ではよろしく」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, please proceed.\""},{"lineNumber":52691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいっ、しかと……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes, understood...!\""},{"lineNumber":52692,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔法力抜きでも起動できない事はないですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's not impossible to start it without magic power,"},{"lineNumber":52693,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やはり、手間がかかりましてなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"but it certainly takes more trouble.\""},{"lineNumber":52694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お任せください。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Leave it to me."},{"lineNumber":52695,"originalJapaneseLine":"　起動プロトコル進行、","translatedEnglishLine":"Initiating startup protocol,"},{"lineNumber":52696,"originalJapaneseLine":"　管理者モードに移行……」","translatedEnglishLine":"switching to administrator mode...\""},{"lineNumber":52697,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さてさて、ではこちらも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, as for this as well...\""},{"lineNumber":52698,"originalJapaneseLine":"配下が手際よくプロセスを進める横で、","translatedEnglishLine":"Next to his subordinates efficiently progressing through the process,"},{"lineNumber":52699,"originalJapaneseLine":"チョチョマンは持ってきた荷物を開き始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chochoman began unpacking the luggage he had brought."},{"lineNumber":52700,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これを……よし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This... alright."},{"lineNumber":52701,"originalJapaneseLine":"　閣下、パスワードを……閣下？","translatedEnglishLine":"Your Excellency, the password... Your Excellency?"},{"lineNumber":52702,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの、何を……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Um, what are you...?"},{"lineNumber":52703,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、これですか？　気になさらず。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, this? Don't worry about it."},{"lineNumber":52704,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パスワードですな」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the password.\""},{"lineNumber":52705,"originalJapaneseLine":"片手で握れる程度の箱のような物を積み上げる","translatedEnglishLine":"He stacked what seemed like small boxes graspable with one hand,"},{"lineNumber":52706,"originalJapaneseLine":"手を止めて、チョチョマンは","translatedEnglishLine":"paused his actions and Chochoman"},{"lineNumber":52707,"originalJapaneseLine":"コンソールでパスワードを入力する。","translatedEnglishLine":"entered the password on the console."},{"lineNumber":52708,"originalJapaneseLine":"膨大な桁数のパスワードが、","translatedEnglishLine":"A password with an enormous number of digits,"},{"lineNumber":52709,"originalJapaneseLine":"メモなどで確認される事もなく","translatedEnglishLine":"without needing to be checked on any note,"},{"lineNumber":52710,"originalJapaneseLine":"滑らかに打ち込まれていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"was smoothly typed in."},{"lineNumber":52711,"originalJapaneseLine":"（この箱は……ん、密封してある……","translatedEnglishLine":"(This box... hmm, it's sealed..."},{"lineNumber":52712,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中は…………）","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside is...)"},{"lineNumber":52713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はにはにっ　はにはにっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hani hani, hani hani.\""},{"lineNumber":52714,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うわぁあっ！　ぷ、プチハニー爆弾！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-waaah! A p-puchi honey bomb!?\""},{"lineNumber":52715,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おやおや。ほっほ。保険ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh dear. Hoho. It's insurance.\""},{"lineNumber":52716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほ、保険……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-i-insurance...?\""},{"lineNumber":52717,"originalJapaneseLine":"コンソールに視線を落としたまま、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without looking up from the console,"},{"lineNumber":52718,"originalJapaneseLine":"チョチョマンはこともなげに答える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chochoman casually answered."},{"lineNumber":52719,"originalJapaneseLine":"「事が成れば我らの勝利……ですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If things go well, it will be our victory... but,"},{"lineNumber":52720,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここが狙われた時、","translatedEnglishLine":"if this place gets targeted,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんなを……信じています。
そして、落胆されたくないんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And I don't want to see anyone disappointed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事な人たちに」
その姿に、チョチョマンは満足げに眼を細める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that figure, Chochoman narrowed his eyes with satisfaction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「良いものです。
若者の成長を間近で見られるというのは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be able to see the growth of youth up close."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……恐縮です、チョチョマン先生」
面映ゆげに、アレックスが苦笑をこぼした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blushing slightly, Alex let out an awkward smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肩の力がほんの少し抜けた後には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After he slightly relaxed his shoulders,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう最後のシークエンスに入っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they had already entered the final sequence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、先生……いえ四天王閣下。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, Master... no, Your Excellency of the Four Heavenly Kings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後のキーの入力を」
「はいはい、っと」
「ほっほ。では掛かりますか」
「は、ははっ！」
四天王、チョチョマン・パブリが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Four Heavenly Kings member, Chochoman Pabli,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 配下と共に制御システムまでやって来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had come all the way to the control system with his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「手筈はお伝えしてありますな？
ではよろしく」
「は、はいっ、しかと……！」
「魔法力抜きでも起動できない事はないですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not impossible to start it without magic power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やはり、手間がかかりましてなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it certainly takes more trouble."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お任せください。
起動プロトコル進行、
管理者モードに移行……」
「さてさて、ではこちらも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, as for this as well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 配下が手際よくプロセスを進める横で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next to his subordinates efficiently progressing through the process,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チョチョマンは持ってきた荷物を開き始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chochoman began unpacking the luggage he had brought.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これを……よし。
閣下、パスワードを……閣下？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your Excellency, the password... Your Excellency?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、何を……？」
「ああ、これですか？　気になさらず。
パスワードですな」
片手で握れる程度の箱のような物を積み上げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He stacked what seemed like small boxes graspable with one hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手を止めて、チョチョマンは
コンソールでパスワードを入力する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: entered the password on the console.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膨大な桁数のパスワードが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A password with an enormous number of digits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモなどで確認される事もなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without needing to be checked on any note,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 滑らかに打ち込まれていく。
（この箱は……ん、密封してある……
「はにはにっ　はにはにっ」
「う、うわぁあっ！　ぷ、プチハニー爆弾！？」
「おやおや。ほっほ。保険ですよ」
コンソールに視線を落としたまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without looking up from the console,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チョチョマンはこともなげに答える。
「事が成れば我らの勝利……ですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If things go well, it will be our victory... but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここが狙われた時、

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
